text: Hi everyone. Does any one know, is it possible to access Companies-> *Web Technologies properties via API get method?*

Hello!, i need help to use events API and marketing API to extract client statics, anyone can help me?

Hey everyone! We have recently been hitting quite a few HTTP 429 errors with a message about the _secondly_ limits. This happens even though we rate limit based on the following HTTP response headers:
• `x-HubSpot-ratelimit-interval-milliseconds`
• `x-HubSpot-ratelimit-max`
We use API keys directly and for professional plans the limit should be 150 requests per 10 seconds and although we stayed conservative with 130 or 140 for 10 seconds, we still hit those errors. Empirically we found 40 requests per 10 seconds to kind of work. Does anyone know anything about this?
Thanks! :v:
What kind help you need? I can try help you.

Is it possible to get all Meeting Data out of HubSpot via the API? My first guess was using the form submissions API since HubSpot has them stored as part of their forms object. But trying to do that results in an error stating that the form type is not allowed to be used with that API... which is very silly considering they treat them as forms in every other context.
Is there a batch version of the v1 engagements API to mass-create email engagements? Can't use the v3 beta API because it doesn't allow for a lot of the available options of v1.
Hello! I hope you are doing well today. Im developing an integration between my app and HubSpot, is there a way to get a created dataset?  I didn’t find anything in API docs
